description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up

description:
Labour’s expected manifesto pledge to recognise a Palestinian state is a gift to Jihad and a perverse reward for Hamas's October 7th pogrom, says Jake Wallis Simons. But do the Palestinians actually want a state?

The post Labour’s Pledge to Recognise a Palestinian State Rewards Hamas for its October 7th Pogrom appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Labour’s Pledge to Recognise a Palestinian State Rewards Hamas for its October 7th Pogrom

description:
Sometimes mistaken for a cuddly group of tree huggers who just want better care for the environment, in fact the Green party is terrifying, says Annabel Denham.

The post The Green Party is Terrifying appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Green Party is Terrifying

description:
"If you want to tell people the truth, make them laugh otherwise they'll kill you." George Bernard Shaw was right, says Frank Haviland. Honesty is still the revolutionary act, today perhaps more than ever.

The post Criminalising the Truth appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Criminalising the Truth

description:
Cochrane has finally confirmed that its review on the (in)effectiveness of masks will not be changed, over a year after succumbing to pressure from a New York Times writer. But the damage has been done, says Carl Heneghan.

The post Cochrane Finally Confirms its Mask Review Will Not Be Changed, But the Damage Has Been Done appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Cochrane Finally Confirms its Mask Review Will Not Be Changed, But the Damage Has Been Done

description:
The UN claims that extreme weather has massively increased since 1970. Alex Kriel debunks this myth, pointing to work by Italian scientists which shows it is an illusion created by changes in surveillance.

The post UN Claims About ‘Extreme Weather’ Debunked appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: UN Claims About ‘Extreme Weather’ Debunked

description:
According to Keir Starmer, Labour's plans for a publicly-owned Great British Energy company will help "close the door to Putin". But the UK's high gas prices are due to Net Zero, not Russia, says Ben Pile.

The post Starmer’s Great British Energy Plans Would be a Disaster appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmer’s Great British Energy Plans Would be a Disaster
